newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso dips in dull session.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso dips in dull session.

text.p: Colombia's peso dipped 20 centavos to 1,077 pesos to the dollar in markets that remained quiet because of the U.S. Memorial Day holiday.
Interbank dealers reported just 93 trades worth a total $53 million, well below the daily average of about $180 million. The peso hit an intraday high of 1,076 and sank to a low of 1,077.4.

"Markets were quiet because of the U.S. holiday but we hope to see more fluctuation tomorrow as banks start to square their month-end positions. The peso will probably rise a bit because greenbacks are flowing into the market," one dealer said.
